titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Dean of the College Records, 1971 - 1997
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The Dean of the College is responsible for addressing campus issues related to students, including academics, activities, diversity, health, and on-campus residences.
The Dean of the College Records date from the tenures of Edgar Beckham (1973-1990) and Allen Green (1994-1997).

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Series 1 and 2 open. The third series contains restricted material and is closed.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Dean of the College Records, Collection #2000-63, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the office of the Dean of the College in 2000. Additions to this collection were received in 2002 (2002-35) and 2011 (2011-24) but are restricted and have not been processed.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Dean of the College is responsible for addressing campus issues related to students, including academics, activities, diversity, health, and on-campus residences.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Dean of the College Records are alphabetically arranged general subject files created by the office of the Dean of the College. There are two series of records, the first of which primarily relates to Edgar Beckam's term, and the second relates to Allen Green's term; however, there is much overlap between the two. The third series contains restricted records.

Series 1 contains material on a wide variety of issues related to the student body, including admissions, curricula, substance abuse, budgets, health, and institutional research. It also documents the 1985 visit of Louis Farrakhan.

Series 2 includes extensive documentation of The Great Hollow Wilderness School (1988-1995), Institutional Research projects (1973-1991), Organizations, the Consortium on Financing Higher Education (COFHE), university facilities planning, and the Presidential Search Committee (1994-1995).

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The arrangement is primarily alphabetical, with some inconsistencies.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges--Administration.
